results.title: Horace Goes Skiing for Commodore 64
results.creator_credit: William Tang, Melbourne House and Beam Software
results.material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette and cover in a plastic cassette case.
results.brief_description: Horace Goes Skiing [computer game]. Horace Goes Skiing is a single player game with multiple genres. The first is similar to Frogger, where players begin with $40 and guide Horace across a busy road to the ski lodge. Getting hit by a vehicle costs Horace $10 in ambulance fees. Once Horace makes it to the lodge and hires skiis, it becomes a ski game where players slalom between flags and avoid trees. Colliding with a tree will send Horace back to the start of the game. When Horace runs out of money, the game ends.
results.creator_credit_for_label: William Tang, Melbourne House and Beam Software
results.description: Horace Goes Skiing is a single player game with multiple genres. Once Horace makes it to the lodge and hires skis, it becomes a ski game where players slalom between flags and avoid trees. Colliding with a tree will send Horace back to the start of the game. When Horace runs out of money, the game ends.

The first is similar to Frogger, where players begin with $40 and guide Horace across a busy road to the ski lodge. Getting hit by a vehicle costs Horace $10 in ambulance fees. Once Horace makes it to the lodge and hires skis, it becomes a ski game where players slalom between flags and avoid trees. Colliding with a tree will send Horace back to the start of the game. When Horace runs out of money, the game ends.

results.title: Emulation of Horace Goes Skiing for ZX Spectrum
results.brief_description:
Horace Goes Skiing is a single player game with multiple genres. The first is similar to Frogger, where players begin with $40 and guide Horace across a busy road to the ski lodge. Getting hit by a vehicle costs Horace $10 in ambulance fees. Once Horace makes it to the lodge and hires skiis, it becomes a ski game where players slalom between flags and avoid trees. Colliding with a tree will send Horace back to the start of the game. When Horace runs out of money, the game ends.

Original game developed by Beam Software for ZX Spectrum 48/128, Published in 1982 by Melbourne House and Psion Software
results.title_for_label: Horace Goes Skiing [computer game] for ZX Spectrum [harvested game emulation file]
results.description:
Horace Goes Skiing is a single player game with multiple genres. The first is similar to Frogger, where players begin with $40 and guide Horace across a busy road to the ski lodge. Getting hit by a vehicle costs Horace $10 in ambulance fees. Once Horace makes it to the lodge and hires skiis, it becomes a ski game where players slalom between flags and avoid trees. Colliding with a tree will send Horace back to the start of the game. When Horace runs out of money, the game ends.

Original game developed by Beam Software for ZX Spectrum 48/128, Published in 1982 by Melbourne House and Psion Software

Getting hit by a vehicle costs Horace $10 in ambulance fees. Once Horace makes it to the lodge and hires skiis, it becomes a ski game where players slalom between flags and avoid trees. Colliding with a tree will send Horace back to the start of the game. When Horace runs out of money, the game ends.

Original game developed by Beam Software for ZX Spectrum 48/128, Published in 1982 by Melbourne House and Psion Software

results.title: In conversation with NASA astronaut Rex Walheim
results.brief_description: To top off a decade-long career at NASA, Rex Walheim was in the final shuttle mission for NASA’s 30 year space program. He provides a detailed account of NASA’s space program and space exploration moving forward, as well as the achievements of the past. He also looks at his own path to becoming an astronaut, the experience of space travel and how to do a space walk.
results.title_for_label: In conversation with NASA astronaut Rex Walheim
results.description: To top off a decade-long career at NASA, Rex Walheim was in the final shuttle mission for NASA’s 30 year space program. He provides a detailed account of NASA’s space program and space exploration moving forward, as well as the achievements of the past. He also looks at his own path to becoming an astronaut, the experience of space travel and how to do a space walk.

He provides a detailed account of NASA’s space program and space exploration moving forward, as well as the achievements of the past. He also looks at his own path to becoming an astronaut, the experience of space travel and how to do a space walk.

results.title: The Long road to independence
results.creator_credit: Mohammed Abdur Rahman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Serving in the Australian army in East Timor, Mohammed Abdur Rahman and his fellow soldiers were attacked by the Indonesian army many times and involved in some highly publicized events. Over time, Rahman became quite connected to the nation and its people, performing humanitarian work and witnessing East Timor’s struggle towards independence.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Mohammed Abdur Rahman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Serving in the Australian army in East Timor, Mohammed Abdur Rahman and his fellow soldiers were attacked by the Indonesian army many times and involved in some highly publicized events. Over time, Rahman became quite connected to the nation and its people, performing humanitarian work and witnessing East Timor’s struggle towards independence.

Over time, Rahman became quite connected to the nation and its people, performing humanitarian work and witnessing East Timor’s struggle towards independence.

results.title: The Medic
results.creator_credit: Maurice Benson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Maurice Benson was posted in Vietnam as a medic, he had no idea how much he was following in his father’s footsteps.

results.title: Bribie
results.creator_credit: Kevin Brady, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Kevin Brady sets the record straight on the Battle of Bribie, considered to be the closest Australia got to losing a battle in Vietnam. His “digger’s account” illustrates the major obstacles and the bravery shown by the men, who were met with gunfire on landing.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kevin Brady, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Kevin Brady sets the record straight on the Battle of Bribie, considered to be the closest Australia got to losing a battle in Vietnam. His “digger’s account” illustrates the major obstacles and the bravery shown by the men, who were met with gunfire on landing.

results.title: Growing up fast
results.creator_credit: John Croxford, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: It was itchy feet that encouraged John Croxford to join the Australian Navy. He spent most of his time patrolling the Korean coast where there was no room for mistakes.

results.title: Wake up call
results.creator_credit: Jack Pearce, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: While Jack Pearce may have missed the war, there was still plenty of dangerous work for him to do, clearing mines up the Queensland coast for the Australian Navy.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jack Pearce, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Becoming an Australian
results.creator_credit: George Logan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: It wasn’t until George Logan served in the army overseas that he felt like a true Australian. Serving as an infantryman in Malaya and Vietnam, it was the values of mateship, care and concern for others that remain with Logan today.
results.creator_credit_for_label: George Logan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
